What Happened: San Francisco; CA-based Allvoices appointed David Warthen as Chief Technology Officer.
About Person: David Warthen was previously the co-founder of Ask Jeeves.
About Company: Missionallvoices is a global community that shares news; videos; images and opinions tied to news events and people.

Title: Facility Chief Information Officer at Department o
Headline: Jack Smith was Appointed as Facility Chief Information Officer at Department of Veteran Affairs
What Happened: Washington; DC-based Department of Veteran Affairs appointed Jack Smith as Facility Chief Information Officer at Department o.
About Person: Jack Smith was previously the Commanding Officer (CEO) at Coast Guard Headquarters Support Command
About Company: Mission StatementTo fulfill President Lincoln's promise “To care for him who shall have borne the battle; and for his widow; and his orphan” by serving and honoring the men and women who are America s veterans.

Title: Director
Headline: Kenneth Theis was Promoted to Director at Michigan; Department of Information Technology
What Happened: Lansing; MI-based Michigan; Department of Information Technology promoted Kenneth Theis to Director.
About Person: Kenneth Theis was previously with General Motors Corporation where he held several key business and technology leadership positions.
About Company: Michigan is the eighth most populous state in the United States. It has the longest freshwater coastline of any political subdivision in the world; being bounded by four of the five Great Lakes; plus Lake Saint Clair.

Title: Chief Information Officer
Headline: Chris Scalet was Appointed as Chief Information Officer at Merck & Co.
What Happened: Whitehouse Station; NJ-based Merck & Co. appointed Chris Scalet as Chief Information Officer.
About Person: Chris Scalet was previously the SVP of IT & CIO at International Paper (IP). He was responsible for IT strategy and planning; including data center operations; applications development and support; and telecommunications worldwide.
About Company: Merck is a global pharmaceutical and chemical company with a history that began in 1668; and a future shaped by around 40;000 employees in 64 countries.

Title: Chief Information Officer
Headline: Sharon Solomon was Appointed as Chief Information Officer at MedImmune
What Happened: Gaithersburg; MD-based MedImmune appointed Sharon Solomon as Chief Information Officer.
About Person: Sharon Solomon was previously the CIO & Vice President; Information Technology at Jacuzzi Group Worldwide
About Company: MedImmune strives to provide better medicines to patients; new medical options for physicians; and rewarding careers to employees.

Title: Vice President of Technology Operations and Infras
Headline: Jason Evans was Appointed as Vice President of Technology Operations and Infras at MediaMath
What Happened: New York; NY-based MediaMath appointed Jason Evans as Vice President of Technology Operations and Infras.
About Person: Jason Evans was previously the Vice President of Operations for Panther Express; where he built and managed 40 data centers in 28 countries; and managed the infrastructure’s growth from 250 Mbps to support over 200 Gbps of sustained traffic.
About Company: MediaMath offers cross-exchange advertising management services and technology.

Title: Chief Technology Officer
Headline: Robert Ritchie was Appointed as Chief Technology Officer at Masonite
What Happened: Tampa; FL-based Masonite appointed Robert Ritchie as Chief Technology Officer.
About Person: Robert Ritchie was previously the Chief Technology Officer and Vice President of Research & Development at Johns Manville Corporation; where he managed the development and execution of the company’s global technology strategy.
About Company: Masonite is a unique; integrated; global building products company with its Corporate Headquarters in Tampa; Florida.

Title: Chief Technology Officer
Headline: Avikam Perry Resigned as Chief Technology Officer at Magic Software Enterprises
What Happened: Laguna Hills; CA-based Magic Software Enterprises accepted resignation of Avikam Perry as Chief Technology Officer.
About Person: Avikam Perry was previously the Project Manager at Doble Engineering
About Company: Magic Software Enterprises Ltd. (NASDAQ: MGIC) is a provider of multiple-mode application platform solutions  including Full Client; Rich Internet Applications (RIA) or Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) deployment modes - and business and process integration solutions.

Title: Chief Technology Officer
Headline: Paul Makiewich Resigned as Chief Technology Officer at Alcatel Lucent
What Happened: New Providence; NJ-based Alcatel Lucent accepted resignation of Paul Makiewich as Chief Technology Officer.
About Person: Paul Makiewich was previously the CTO and Chief Architect for Lucent Technologies. In this role; Paul was responsible for the technology direction of all Lucent products and solutions including mobile; optical; switching and data networking solutions; IP Multimedia Subsystem (IMS) and end-user applications.
About Company: Lucent Technologies composed of what was formerly known as AT&T Technologies; including Western Electric and Bell Labs and was spun off in 1996.

About Person: William Thayer was previously the Senior Vice President; Information Technology / Logistics at Loehmann's
About Company: Loehmann's department store provides top fashion designer label discounts for men and; women.

Title: Chief Information Officer
Headline: Andrew Moore was Appointed as Chief Information Officer at Boulder Valley School District
What Happened: Boulder; CO-based Boulder Valley School District appointed Andrew Moore as Chief Information Officer.
About Person: Andrew Moore was previously the T Director at Oracle Corporation
About Company: Located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains; Boulder Valley School District (BVSD) stretches from the peaks of the Continental Divide to the suburbs of Denver.

Title: Chief Information Technology Officer
Headline: Klara Jelinkova was Appointed as Chief Information Technology Officer at The University of Chicago
What Happened: Chicago; IL-based The University of Chicago appointed Klara Jelinkova as Chief Information Technology Officer.
About Person: Klara Jelinkova was previously the Assistant Vice President for Shared Services and Infrastructure at Duke University
About Company: Located in the community of Hyde Park on Chicago s South Side; just 15 minutes from the city center; the University of Chicago is uniquely positioned to contribute to; and draw from; the strength and diversity of this world-class metropolis.
